name: Roll With It, Diceboy!
description:
Help Diceboy survive and hold his own within the messy and chaotic board game box!

Gain random powerups throughout the game that give you awesome game-themed powerups, but be careful! With great power also comes pretty big weaknesses too!

Defeat the the other living game pieces by using your special abilities... or just barrel through them with your powerful rolls!

  • ♟Knight = DoubleJump + Jumps Damage Enemies
  • 🗡Rogue = Melee Attack
  • 🎩 Non Descript Capitalist Man = Ranged Money Attack

See how long you can keep Diceboy alive and healthy to play another day!

Thumbnail + Loading Screen Art By @brad.forsythe596 on Instagram
